title: Encountered error `Unimplemented` selecting `Binder(<animation::PixbufSimpleAnim as glib::translate::ToGlibPtr<*mut <animation::PixbufAnimation as glib::wrapper::Wrapper>::GlibType>>)` during codegen

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Hello,
in a [travis build](https://travis-ci.org/Gerschtli/dwm-status/jobs/472326777#L1633) I received a compiler panic executing the command `cargo tarpaulin --out Xml` (tracking issue: https://github.com/xd009642/tarpaulin/issues/186). Because I have no insights about tarpaulin, I can't provide more information as you can get from the travis build log.

I will post the important parts of the log down here, TIA!

```
$ rustc --version
rustc 1.33.0-nightly (14b96659e 2018-12-25)
$ rustup --version
rustup 1.16.0 (beab5ac2b 2018-12-06)
$ cargo --version
cargo 1.33.0-nightly (2cf1f5dda 2018-12-11)
```

Full output of command:
```
$ RUST_BACKTRACE=full cargo tarpaulin --out Xml
Building project
error: internal compiler error: src/librustc/traits/codegen/mod.rs:68: Encountered error `Unimplemented` selecting `Binder(<animation::PixbufSimpleAnim as glib::translate::ToGlibPtr<*mut <animation::PixbufAnimation as glib::wrapper::Wrapper>::GlibType>>)` during codegen
```
